General.Name: Bloomios Inc
General.Description: Bloomios, Inc. manufactures, markets, and distributes cannabidiol products. The company's product categories include edibles, tinctures, oils, salves, capsules, balms, lotions, creams, beverages, and pet treats. It sells its hemp derived supplements and cosmetic products through wholesale and retail distribution channels. The company was formerly known as XLR Medical Corp. and changed its name to Bloomios, Inc. in April 2021. Bloomios, Inc. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Santa Barbara, California.
General.Address: 201 West Montecito Street, Santa Barbara, CA, United States, 93101
